name: Heroes Must Die
description: Heroes Must Die is an action-RPG with aesthetics inspired by the best roleplaying games of the 16 bit era, with the sophisticated story and design of modern epics. Follow a grand and fun story of trying to break the world and then save it. Combat is easy to learn and difficult to master. Best of all, it's free.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: 2.1 GHZ dual core or later Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: yes

reviews.review_text: It's not a bad game, the fighting is definitely interesting but combos are really confusing. Overall this game is a good game if you're bored .

I really, really wanted to like this game: it's story is charming and the game mechanics are an interesting twist on turn-based combat. VERY interesting. The big problem is that those mechanics never change, so the game becomes redundant and a chore by the time you reach the end. If even a little more variety was added to this game, it would be an absolute recommend; for now, let me say that it's at least worth a try.
